about_the_game:
I can´t leave the house: I have stuff to do.

A house, your house and things to do. How many? You don't know, but somehow they keep you from leaving it.
Explore the house, check the rooms and finish the chores. Some of them might be simple, some of them will require some investigation.

Remember not to get overwhelmed.

Did you left something behind? Maybe, you don´t know and it is that doubt the one that will alter your perception. Your vision will change and so will the space. Some things might appear, or maybe it is just your mind playing tricks. Who knows? Your perception will be tested and new things could be lurking around you. Just remember to breathe and... Check your pulse.

Want to hang out?:

  • Point and click movement like classics like Myst.
  • Retro style. Less is more and here the atmosphere demands it.
  • Experimental minimalist gameplay.
  • Playing with unease in order to create an experience intended to be finished in under two hours. Maybe more, maybe less. Who knows how deep the rabbit hole goes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu x86_64 (64-bit CPU) SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1366 x 768
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu x86_64 (64-bit CPU), SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080

name: Stuff to do

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later 64X
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Graphics: 1366 x 768
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64X
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: I can´t leave the house: I have stuff to do. Remember not to get overwhelmed.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Czech, Korean, Greek, Norwegian
